title: Ninja (2009) [Ghost] DVDRip
description:
MOVIE INFORMATION
_________________

Title: Ninja
Year: 2009
IMDb rating: 5.3
Director: Isaac Florentine
Genre: Action/Crime/Drama/Thriller
Featuring Scott Adkins, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Mika Hijii
Description: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjitsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armoured chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.


PRODUCT
_______

Format: DVD
Edition: "Limited Uncut Edition", steelcase

Subtitle Language: English, both English and foreign parts (no Hearing Impaired)
Subtitles were downloaded from subscene.com, modified to fit this video and foreign parts were translated from Japanese by Ghostkeeper.
Final size: 530MB (474MB video, 56MB audio)
